Post.title: Hexo Theme NexT
Post._content:
# NexT [![views](https://sourcegraph.com/api/repos/github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next/.counters/views.svg)](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next)

> NexT  [Hexo](http://hexo.io) 


[](http://notes.iissnan.com) |  [English Documentation](README.en.md)


## 

* 

![Desktop Preview](http://iissnan.com/nexus/next/desktop-preview.png)


<!--more-->
<!--tag-->
* 

![Desktop Sidebar Preview](http://iissnan.com/nexus/next/desktop-sidebar-preview.png)

* 

![Desktop Sidebar Preview](http://iissnan.com/nexus/next/desktop-sidebar-toc.png)

* 

![Mobile Preview](http://iissnan.com/nexus/next/mobile.png)


## 

1.  GitHub 

        $ cd your-hexo-site
        $ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next

2. **** `_config.yml` `theme``next`

        theme: next

## 

```
cd theme/next
git pull
```

****


## 



- LOGO
- /
- /DISQUS
- 
- RSS
- about
- 5
- [Google](www.google.com/analytics)/[](http://tongji.baidu.com/)
- Google Webmaster tools
- Creative Commons
- 
- MathJax

###  LOGO 

NexT  [IcoMoon](http://icomoon.io) 

`LOGO`

1.  [IcoMoon] (http://icomoon.io) `foo`  `icomoon` 
2.  `source/fonts/`  `icon-`  `foo`  `source/fonts/icon-foo`
3.  `source/css/_fonts/`  `styl`  `icon-foo.styl` IcoMoon  `styl` 

    |class               | usage                |
    |:-------------------|:---------------------|
    |icon-logo           | Logo          |
    |icon-home           | Home  |
    |icon-archives       | Archives    |
    |icon-tags           | Tags    |
    |icon-feed           | RSS   |
    |icon-about          | About    |
    |icon-heart          |       |
    |icon-external-link  |   |

4.  `icon_font`  `foo`

        icon_font: foo



### /

> 
> **** `_config.yml`  `language`  `zh-Hans` 

```
language: zh-Hans
```

### /DISQUS

>  Disqus  Disqus 
> 



**** `_config.yml`  `duoshuo_shortname` 

```
duoshuo_shortname: your-duoshuo-shortname
```

 [Disqus](https://disqus.com)

**** `_config.yml`  `disqus_shortname` 

```
disqus_shortname: your-disqus-shortname
```

### 

> 

-  `tags` 

        hexo new page "tags"

-  `tags` 

        title: All tags
        date: 2014-12-22 12:39:04
        type: "tags"

-  `_config.yml`  `tags`  `menu` :

        menu:
          home: /
          archives: /archives
          tags: /tags


### RSS

>  feed 

 `_config.yml`  `rss` 

1. `rss: false`Feed
2. `rss:  ` Feed  [hexo-generator-feed](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-generator-feed)  Feed

     `hexo-generator-feed`  Feed  Feed 

3. `rss: http://your-feed-url` Feed 


### about 

>  about 

 `about` 

```
hexo new page "about"
```

 `about`  `_configy.yml`  `menu`  `about` 

```
menu:
  home: /
  archives: /archives
  tags: /tags
  about: /about
```

### 5

NexT  [Tomorrow Theme](https://github.com/chriskempson/tomorrow-theme) 5
 `normal` `normal`  `night` 

![Tomorrow Normal Preview](http://iissnan.com/nexus/next/tomorrow-normal.png)
![Tomorrow Night Preview](http://iissnan.com/nexus/next/tomorrow-night.png)

 [Tomorrow Theme](https://github.com/chriskempson/tomorrow-theme) 


###  Google/

>  Google ID

**** `_config.yml`  `google_analytics`  `baidu_analytics`

```
google_analytics: your-analytics-id

baidu_analytics: your-analytics-id

```

###  Google Webmaster tools

>  [Google](https://www.google.com/webmasters/tools/)  sitemap

**** `_config.yml` `google_site_verification`

```
google_site_verification: your-verification-meta
```

###  Creative Commons

>  [Creative commons](http://creativecommons.org/)

**** `_config.yml`  `creative_commons`
 `by | by-nc | by-nc-nd | by-nc-sa | by-nd | by-sa | zero`

```
creative_commons: by-nc-sa
```

### 

>  ` 2013 - 2015`

**** `_config.yml` `since`

```
since: 2013
```

### 

**** `_config.yml` `avatar` 

### 

**** `_config.yml` `social`

```
# Social links
social:
  github: https://github.com/your-user-name
  twitter: https://twitter.com/your-user-name
  weibo: http://weibo.com/your-user-name
  douban: http://douban.com/people/your-user-name
  zhihu: http://www.zhihu.com/people/your-user-name
  // 
```


## 

> NexT 

**** `_config.yml`

```
# NexT  ==========================

avatar: http://your-avatar-url
since: 2015

# EndNexT  ==========================
```


```
# 
menu:
  home: /
  archives: /archives
  tags: /tags
  #about: /about

# Favicon
# `Next 0.2`favicon
# favicon`hexo-site/source/`
favicon: /favicon.ico

# `false``rss`
# `hexo-site-feed`feed
# `url`feed
rss: false


# 
# NexT: default | linecons | fifty-shades | feather
icon_font: default
#icon_font: fifty-shades
#icon_font: feather
#icon_font: linecons


# 
# available: normal | night | night eighties | night blue | night bright
highlight_theme: normal
```

## 

![Browser support](http://iissnan.com/nexus/next/browser-support.png)


## 

`PR`


## 

> NexT is built for easily use with elegant appearance.

First things first, always keep things simple.

## TODO

- [x] Using Swig instead of jade.
- [x] Using SCSS instead of stylus (depends?).
- [x] Rewrite link post related stuffs (Breaking changes).
- [x] Redesign pagination for mobile devices.
- [x] Support category.(Won't support).
- [x] Support gallery posts.
- [x] Make PAJAX and NProgress as optional. (Removed, conflicts with fancybox)
- [x] Add a feed link.
- [x] Refactor.
- [x] i18n.
- [x] How to use this theme.
- [x] Publish as a bower package.
- [ ] Home page.
- [ ] HTML5 Please
- [ ] Add [typicons.font](https://github.com/stephenhutchings/typicons.font).
- [x] Disuqus support.
- [ ] TIT - Theme in theme.
- [x] Motion design.
- [x] Expandable information area.
- [ ] New Gallery design.
- [x] Add Google site verification meta.
- [x] Add Google/Baidu analytics.


[![hexo-image]][hexo-url]
[![bower-image]][bower-url]
[![jquery-image]][jquery-url]

[hexo-image]: http://img.shields.io/badge/Hexo-2.4+-2BAF2B.svg?style=flat-square
[hexo-url]: http://hexo.io
[bower-image]: http://img.shields.io/badge/Bower-*-2BAF2B.svg?style=flat-square
[bower-url]: http://bower.io
[jquery-image]: https://img.shields.io/badge/jquery-1.9-blue.svg?style=flat-square
[jquery-url]: http://jquery.com/

Post.title: Navicatsql(MySQL)
Post._content:
w

  

sql

![Navicat](/images/mysql_error.png)

  

``` bash
mysql -uusername -ppassword --default-character-set=utf8 database_name < "path/to/file.sql"
```

Hello World~

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](http://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](http://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](http://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](http://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```
<!--more-->
<!--tag-->

More info: [Server](http://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](http://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](http://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
Post.raw:
title: Hello World
tags: Misc
---
Welcome to [Hexo](http://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](http://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](http://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](http://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```
<!--more-->
<!--tag-->

More info: [Server](http://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](http://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](http://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
